snippet: Rashid al-Dhaheri, who became enamored of motorsports after attending a Formula One race with his father, has been winning youth go-kart races and building a following in the United Arab Emirates.
abstract: Rashid al-Dhaheri, 6-year-old who found his calling after attending Formula One race with his father, is seen as future of auto racing in United Arab Emirates; is already a winner with a growing following on go-kart circuit.
lead_paragraph: Rashid al-Dhaheri, who became enamored of motorsports after attending a Formula One race with his father, has been winning youth go-kart races and building a following in the United Arab Emirates.

headline.seo: Rashid al-Dhaheri, a Precocious Driver at 6, Builds a Following in the United Arab Emirates
headline.main: Far Ahead of Curve, a 6-Year-Old Thrills a Nation
headline.print_headline: Far Ahead of Curve, a 6-Year-Old Thrills a Nation
